title: US Supreme Court appears reluctant to let Trump fire Fed's Lisa Cook
full_text: US Supreme Court appears reluctant to let Trump fire Fed's Lisa Cook. By Andrew Chung, John Kruzel and David Lawder WASHINGTON, Jan 21 (Reuters) - Conservative and liberal U.S..
